thread.section_title: Premium Mortgage Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Premium Mortgage | premiummortgage.com | 4 of 20
thread.title: Paula Amico
thread.title_full: Premium Mortgage reviewed by Paula Amico

author: Paula Amico
title: Paula Amico
text: When using premium you don't have to chase or worry; you know when you hand the client to your chosen loan officer that your clients needs will be handled. The in-house underwriting saves time and phone calls! One stop shopping coupled with premium service - what more could an agent want?!
